Text: Special offer from YOURPICKSNET and BETANYTHINGCOMweeks contest was very close at Todd Gerbovaz and Brent Menzel tied at the top with points It had to got to the nd tiebreaker for Todd to win first prize Russell McInville won third prize In the year to date contest Jason Bartels has moved into the lead with points Chris Gray is in second place with and Michael Clay is in third place with Congratulations to this weeks winners Betanythingcom is glad to provide the winning prizes this week In celebration of the new working relationship with Smartreminderscom and is offering a special promotion starting immediately Betanythingcom is offering a sign up bonus for new registrations ie new customers For the first new registrations received will be deposited into these accounts with the only restriction is that the must be wagered before a payout For all other new registrations this weekend will be deposited into these accounts with an additional restriction that is the maximum payout is limited to without a minimum deposit from the customer If there is a deposit then any amount is available for withdrawal This is free money Take advantage of this opportunity If you have any questions please contact BetAnything customer service at Dont forget NASCAR NBA and the NHL this week Best of luck to everyone this weekend John Buch
